ValidationRule.description: Week Day values must be greater or equal than 0 (>=0)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: cgcloud__Monday__c < 0 || cgcloud__Tuesday__c < 0 || cgcloud__Wednesday__c < 0 || cgcloud__Thursday__c < 0 || cgcloud__Friday__c < 0 || cgcloud__Saturday__c < 0 || cgcloud__Sunday__c < 0
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Week Day values must be greater or equal than 0.
